review: Google missed the boat with this one.  The Roku is a superior product, particularly as you can do most of what Chromcast offers with the Roku 3.  We did try to stream a ball game that was on the computer, but the stream had the audio so completely out of synch that it was unwatchable.  We finally opted to just connect the computer directly to the TV.I'm a big fan of Google, and will assume this was their one flub.  I'll try the next version when it comes out (sometimes a company has to slip with the first one to get it right.  Just look at the Logitech Wireless Trackball) but I'd pass on this one.
